resources.string: No photos.\n Take photos and tap on Gallery notification.
Scan this QR CODE with InLens to add other users as photographers to this Cloud-Album
Have you received Gallery notification ? \n \nInLens Gallery will store all photos taken after you joined the album to upload into it.
Now , take photos and then tap on notification to open gallery. \n\nNotification will remain until album ends to open gallery easily
Notification exists till album expires. After each photo session just tap on it. You do not have to navigate through InLens all the time.
